testlink.api.java.client.tc.autoexec
Class ExecuteTestCaseEvent

java.lang.Object
  testlink.api.java.client.tc.autoexec.ExecuteTestCaseEvent

public class ExecuteTestCaseEvent
extends java.lang.Object

The event created during test case execution. This event is passed to ExecuteTestCaseListeners.

Author:
Daniel Padilla

Field Summary
static short EXECUTION_FAILED
          Indicates test cases could not be individually tested for even larger errors.

          Indicates test cases could not be individually tested for even larger errors.

static short TEST_CASE_BOMBED
          Indicates that the test case failed with an exception.
static short TEST_CASE_COMPLETED
          Indicates that the test case has been completed.
static short TEST_CASE_EXECUTOR_MISSING
          Indicates that the test case has not had an executor registered.
static short TEST_CASE_REPORTING_FAILED
          Indicates that the test case result reporting to test link failed.
static short TEST_CASE_START
          Indicates that the test case is about to be tested.
static short TEST_CASES_RESET
          Indicates that the test case has been reset.
